TopicTitle: OX Solar Panels will not retract

Articles.Content:
Linux Mint

KSP.x86\_64

In Career Mode.

OX panels will not retract while their Hard Cover Counterparts behave properly.

Initially observed in orbit. OX panels mounted in new service bay. Extended but did not show option to retract. No little blue Retract button.

Eva Jeb could see the Retract button but it did not respond when clicked.

Reverted to VAB exited game.

Reloaded game and retried OX panel on launch pad no retract option visible.

Tried Panel mounted on exterior of ship to same effect.

As mentioned above, the hard panel versions seem to work fine on the launch pad.

This is *intended*, did you read the readme?

These panels now are for space only. They deploy once. If you want to retract, use the SP models.

Oh silly me. 

I didn't get the readme memo.

I read the in-game description, like a bloody fool and because it has the same description, I thought it worked the same way. Oh dear Oh dear.. what am I eh?
